member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseOptimizedDatasetSchema
member.summary: Use the optimized fast Dataset Schema format (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseFastGuid
member.summary: Use the fast GUID format (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.SerializeNullValues
member.summary: Serialize null values to the output (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseUTCDateTime
member.summary: Use the UTC date format (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.ShowReadOnlyProperties
member.summary: Show the readonly properties of types in the output (default = False)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UsingGlobalTypes
member.summary: Use the $types extension to optimise the output json (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.IgnoreCaseOnDeserialize
member.summary: Ignore case when processing json and deserializing

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.EnableAnonymousTypes
member.summary: Anonymous types have read only properties

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseExtensions
member.summary: Enable fastJSON extensions $types, $type, $map (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseEscapedUnicode
member.summary: Use escaped unicode i.e. \uXXXX format for non ASCII characters (default = True)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.KVStyleStringDictionary
member.summary: Output string key dictionaries as "k"/"v" format (default = False)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.UseValuesOfEnums
member.summary: Output Enum values instead of names (default = False)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.IgnoreAttributes
member.summary: Ignore attributes to check for (default : XmlIgnoreAttribute)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.ParametricConstructorOverride
member.summary:
If you have parametric and no default constructor for you classes (default = False)
IMPORTANT NOTE : If True then all initial values within the class will be ignored and will be not set

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.DateTimeMilliseconds
member.summary: Serialize DateTime milliseconds i.e. yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.nnn (default = false)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.SerializerMaxDepth
member.summary: Maximum depth for circular references in inline mode (default = 20)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.InlineCircularReferences
member.summary: Inline circular or already seen objects instead of replacement with $i (default = False)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSONParameters.SerializeToLowerCaseNames
member.summary: Save property/field names as lowercase (default = false)

member.name: F:fastJSON.JSON.Parameters
member.summary: Globally set-able parameters for controlling the serializer

member.summary: Create a formatted json string (beautified) from an object

member.summary: Create a json representation for an object

member.summary: Create a json representation for an object with parameter override on this call

member.summary: Parse a json string and generate a Dictionary<string,object> or List<object> structure

member.summary: Create a typed generic object from the json

member.summary: Create an object from the json

member.summary: Create an object from the json with parameter override on this call

member.summary: Create an object of type from the json

member.summary: Fill a given object with the json represenation

member.summary: Deep copy an object i.e. clone to a new object

member.summary: Clear the internal reflection cache so you can start from new (you will loose performance)
